laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated TSH level, specific value not provided.
Free T3 and free T4 concentrations were normal, but TSH was elevated.
Multinodular thyroid gland with total volume of 31 ml.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased total volume to 33 ml at age 14 years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Free T3 concentrations elevated (average 10 ng/liter); free T4 concentrations averaged 30 ng/liter; serum TSH levels were unsuppressed.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: RepeatedLY elevated fT3 and fT4 levels over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Total thyroid volume 23 ml; homogeneous structure with a small cyst of 2.5 mm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive increase in thyroid size noted.
